thread.title: Jolly LLB 2 box office collection Day 9: Akshay Kumar’s film earns 88 crore gives tough fight to Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees and Hrithik Roshan’s Kaabil
thread.title_full: Jolly LLB 2 box office collection Day 9: Akshay Kumar’s film earns 88 crore gives tough fight to Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees and Hrithik Roshan’s Kaabil

author: Manisha Mandal
title: Jolly LLB 2 box office collection Day 9: Akshay Kumar’s film earns 88 crore gives tough fight to Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees and Hrithik Roshan’s Kaabil
text:
Jolly LLB 2 box office collection Day 9: Akshay Kumar’s film earns 88 crore gives tough fight to Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees and Hrithik Roshan’s Kaabil Akshay Kumar is no wonder called the box office king By Manisha Mandal | Published: February 19, 2017 3:03 PM IST Comments 
Now’s that Akshay Kumar for you guys. This man is no wonder called the box office king. Akshay’s courtroom drama released last week and it’s still running strong at the box office and how. The film is doing exceptionally well on the second week too. The film has so earned rupees 88 .2o crore which is huge. The film is totally content driven and the fans are raving about AK’s performance as a lawyer. As per official statement, “On Saturday Jolly LLB 2 jumps over 53 percent from Friday. Collects 6.35 crore taking total collection to a massive 88.20 crore! Expect a big jump again on Sunday as the film has outstanding Word of Mouth.”. The second Monday collection of Jolly LLB 2 was bigger and better compared to Shah Rukh Khan ‘s Raees and Hrithik Roshan ‘s Kaabil . The film has earned 4.14 crore on the second Friday which is the best in this year. Though Raees and Kaabil are still running in the theatres, Akshay’s film is least affected by it. In fact Akshay has beaten both the films fairly as Raees earned 2.80 crore while Kaabil minted 2.51 crore on the second Friday. While Jolly LLB 2 has earned rupees 4.14 crore on the second Friday which is just commendable. This shows that the Khiladi Kumar is here to win, he came and he conquered. Now that the film has earned total 88 crore, we won’t be surprised if it will cross 100 crore within 10 days. What say guys? 
Jolly LLB 2 was one of the most talked about film in B-town. Firstly it’s the second installment of Jolly LLB featuring Arshad Warsi and Boman Irani which was a huge hit. So obviously audiences had high hopes for Jolly LLB 2 and it won’t be wrong to say that the film lived up to the audiences expectations a the numbers say it all. The film is just growing bigger and better each day. Stay tuned with us for more on this space. Published Date: February 19, 2017 3:03 PM IST
